content: pocket guy - doll base this free pattern is the base for a doll i m calling the pocket guy my goal with this series is to make a highly customizable doll you can design however you want i m continuously adding to this series with various accessories such as hats jackets pants and more this doll works up quickly uses very little yarn and is low-sew materials needed - worsted weight 4 yarn - 4mm hook - scissors - yarn needle - polyfill/stuffing - stitch marker - 8mm safety eye notes - this pattern is worked in the round i highly recommend using a stitch marker to keep track of your rounds - you will need to know how to make a single_crochet single_crochet slip st slip_stitch and single_crochet decrease scdec if you struggle to make a magic_ring you can make a slip knot and chain 2 work your first round into the second chain from hook - the number in parenthesis at the end of each round is the amount of sts you should have in that round - all loose ends can be tucked into the doll as you make it up or when you re done - your doll will be about 6 in or 15 cm tall body round 1 - 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2 - 2sc in each st around 12 r3 - 2sc in first st single_crochet in next repeat around 18 r4 - 2sc in first st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat around 24 r5 - 2sc in first st single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat around 30 r6-r10 - single_crochet in each st around 30 r11 - scdec in first st single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat around 24 r12 - scdec in first st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat around 18 r13 - scdec in first st single_crochet in next st repeat around 12 place safety eyes between r8 and r9 about 5 sts apart begin stuffing r14 - single_crochet around 12 r15 - 2sc in first st single_crochet in next repeat around 18 r16 - 2sc in first st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat around 24 r17-r22 - single_crochet around 24 continue stuffing turn the doll so the front is facing you and push r22 flat add stitch marker in the 6th st in and through to the other side to create two holes r23 - single_crochet in next 5 sts single_crochet in st with marker on both sides single_crochet in last 5 sts 12 r24-25 - single_crochet in each st around 12 r26 - scdec around 6 stuff leg and cut yarn leaving a long tail sew the hole closed attach yarn to one of the stitch marker sts and remove marker single_crochet in next 12 sts repeat r24-r26 stuff leg and cut a long tail sew hole closed use remaining tail to sew hole between legs arms r1 - single_crochet 8 in magic_ring 8 r2-r7 - single_crochet in each st around 8
